## TupleToUnion type

Convert a tuple to union type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type TupleToUnion<T> = T extends readonly unknown[] ? T[number] : never
```

## Example


```ts
// Expect: string | number
type Foo = TupleToUnion<[string, number]>
```
